sentences.sContent: The Magi, Brahmins, and Druids were bracketed together as men of wisdom.
sentences.sCn: 三贤人、婆罗门、德鲁伊特教僧侣一起被归为智者。

synos.tran: 支架；括号；墙上凸出的托架
括在一起；把…归入同一类；排除

phrases.pCn: 钢支架，钢角码；钢制肘板

remMethod.val: brack(看作black， 黑色的) ＋ et → 黑芝麻被归入健康食品黑五类中 → 把…归入同一类； 参考： rack(n. 行李架)

trans.tranCn: 括号；等级段，档次；壁架，托架
trans.tranOther: one of the pair of signs ( ) put around words to show extra information

trans.tranCn: 把…置于括号内； 把…归入同一类
trans.tranOther: If two or more people or things are bracketed together, they are considered to be similar or related in some way
